sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Elegy on the death of Her Highness Mary Princess Dowager of Aurange daughter to Charles the First, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, &c. Bold, Henry, 1627-1683.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
printed for Edward Husbands, and are to be sold at the sign of the Golden Dragon in Fleet-street, London : 1660.
In verse - "Hail Graceful Mary! Summon'd up to be,". Signed: Hen. Bold. olim è N.C. Oxon. Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 247) and in the Harvard University Library (reel 1790).
=======
Elegy on the death of Her Highness Mary Princess Dowager of Aurange daughter to Charles the First, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, &c. Bold, Henry, 1627-1683.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
printed for Edward Husbands, and are to be sold at the sign of the Golden Dragon in Fleet-street, London : 1660.
In verse - "Hail Graceful Mary! Summon'd up to be,". Signed: Hen. Bold. olim è N.C. Oxon. Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 247) and in the Harvard University Library (reel 1790).
Edward Husbands
the sign of the Golden Dragon in Fleet-street
